Summary: Red, yellow, green lights,one low flying fast object.
trends: There have been no other sightings in Roma
This sighting has never been favorited.
divs: Sighting Detailshave been observing these occurances for over 4 mths .noticed a really brightobject to bright to be a star,saw a light flashing and slowly moving through thesky flashes were 6 seconds apart finally disapeared, then saw a large100footlight come over the horizon about 4 miles away it was only 300-500 metresabove the ground heading in my direction very fast no sounds,i felt fear forthe first time decided that being closer to town would be safer, have smallamount of footage on dv camera also of the pulsating lights that change colourregularly
